overview_of_class: First course of sequence that develops writing skills and structures through examination of the relationship between the individual and society. Emphasis on textual analysis and development of descriptive narrative and argumentative essays.
name: Individual and Society through Written Expression
title: WCAS SPANISH 203-0-20 Individual and Society through Written Expression

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: First course of sequence that develops writing skills and structures through examination of the relationship between the individual and society. Emphasis on textual analysis and development of descriptive narrative and argumentative essays.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Three class meetings a week
Prerequisites: 201, AP score of 5 on the Spanish Language or Literature Exam, or departmental Spanish Language Placement Exam
No P/N
Attendance at first class is required.

class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description
